attributes.action: Establish a fairer systems of elections to the House of Commons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The old first-past-the-post system of parliamentary elections is now one of the main barriers to efficient democracy in the UK. A radical new system which grants seats dependent on share of vote rather then largest minority is needed to make politics more representative of 21st centuary Britain. This will not only encourage greater participation in politics but will also help to protect the ever growing number of minority groups and interest in the country.
